resources.string: You are not connected to the internet
You need to have an internet connection to use the GOV.UK app.
Reconnect to the internet and try again.
You\'re using an old version of the app. Update your app to continue.
You need to update your app
You can update your app if you want to get the latest features and improvements.
You’re using an old version of the app
Update the app to the latest version.\n\nIf you’re already using the latest version, try again later.
